participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and down-to-earth, she is passionate about her dreams and has a strong connection to her roots.
participant_1.background: i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town. my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and practical, he enjoys exploring the outdoors and has a relaxed approach to life.
participant_2.background: i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer. i have a black lab named trooper. my favorite activity is rock climbing.

content.text: Hey! Are you from a small town? Because I am.
